title: Track Fault on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Normal train services from #OutramPark to #Eunos towards #PasirRis has resumed.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 10 mins additional travel time from #OutramPark to #Eunos towards Pasir Ris. We are working to recover service.
[EWL]: UPDATE: Please expect additional 15mins traveling time from Outram Park to Eunos due to track fault near Paya Lebar.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 15 mins additional travel time from #OutramPark towards #Eunos due to a track fault.
[EWL]: Pls cater  10 mins additional travelling time from #Outram Park to #Eunos towards #PasirRis due to a track fault.
